articles.description: Billie Eilish  surprised her audience when she brought out Hayley Williams during the  Coachella Valley Music And Arts Festival in Indio, California, on Saturday.
articles.content:

articles.title: Harry eyes month at Number 1 as Record Store Day 2022 gives Taylor Swift a boost - Official Charts Company
articles.description: Harry Styles' As It Was races ahead at the midweek mark - as Taylor Swift's The Lakes prepares to make its chart debut thanks to Record Store Day 2022.
articles.content:
Harry Styles is already racing ahead to secure a possible month-long stint at Number 1 with As It Was this Friday.
Cat Burns Go could possibly ascend two spots to a new highest peak of Number 3.

articles.author: Monica Greep
articles.title: Royal photographer opens up about Queen's birthday portrait - Daily Mail
articles.description: Henry Dallal, the royal photographer behind the Queen's birthday portrait, has revealed how Her Majesty was 'relaxed and friendly' during their shoot - and that he never has to ask her to smile.
articles.content:
